评论详情: So somehow, I’m embarrassing, but these shorts are not. My son chose them. I don’t really get it. The fabric is a little on the thin side, but in line with the material type. They seem good enough quality and like they will last. Most importantly he’s happy.
These are dang swim trucks passed as basketball shorts, don't buy these I mean they are not bad but they be passing this off as basketball shorts.
Worn on vacation and for basketball practice with no complaints. They don't ride up and aren't hoochie daddy length. These shorts were worn by 5 feet 2 inch boy tween.
Perfect fit, design, and very comfortable. Good quality.
Very thin and comfortable, runs a little big and are longer then shown in the photo. Overall good shorts
In basketball shorts I can do medium, butt here are like gym shorts they’re short/small

Ordered several pairs of these shorts for my son, The other three are great and have a functional drawstring however, the beige bandanna print does not have a functional drawstring. The pockets are also quite small. Otherwise, pretty pleased with the fit and appearance.
These shorts are awesome super comfy, lightweight, and breathable
It nice it looks just like the pictures

Fun & good looking shorts.  Size runs slightly small I'd say, so if you are on the upper side of your size probably just order up 1.  The pockets aren't great, very small and kind of pull the shorts "taut" if you put your hands in them for example. If you are using these as running shorts you may need to be careful about what you carry in the pockets for this reason.  Material is definitely on the pretty thin side of things but that's probably fine for most uses.  I took off 1 star for the pockets not being deep enough and not very well integrated in the fit design I took .5 star off for material thin-ness And .5 star off for size running a bit small because on these shorts it makes an abnormally big difference for fit comfortability.  They look undeniably great though which is the best thing I can say about these.
Good, lightweight shorts. The design is printed very well and visible, they are nice and light which makes them good for summertime.
